query: WITH entities AS (SELECT id FROM core_pending_credit_facilities WHERE COALESCE(customer_id = $1, $1 IS NULL) AND COALESCE(collateralization_state = $2, $2 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE(id > $4, true)) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT $3) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $5 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_pending_credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
